Player History

Hit first career homerun on 6/14/2018, off Gary Casiano (NYA)...
Traded from Minnesota to San Diego on 3/2/2020 (Going to MIN: LF T. Williams Jr.. Going to SDN: CF M. Ott Jr., RF D. Porter, SS D. Leal, P A. Javery Jr.)...
